[img]https://i.imgur.com/Z4GOv8H.png[/img] [h1]Thingamajigs[/h1] Thingamajigs adds assortment of tools at your disposal While you could hack your enemies to pieces with your spatula, it is not adviced! It's far more useful for flipping those muffalo flanks on the frying pan
Available in your closest smithing workbenches (some assembly required)
Mod currently includes
[h2]Pneumatic Pick[/h2] Description: Reliable and deadly mining tool. Stats: +25% mining speed, new +10% Mining yield Materials: Metallic
[h2]Machete[/h2] Desription: Meant to be used for clearing path in dense jungles, Nowadays mostly used for clearing density from someone's shoulders. Stats: +15% Plant work speed Materials: Metallic
[h2]Spatula[/h2] Description: The most cheftacular equipment for cooking. Or shaming your rivals with it's majestic slap Stats: +35% Cooking speed, new: -5% Food poison chance Materials: Metallic, Woody
[h2]Bonesaw[/h2] Description: Theres never a dull moment with a doctor armed with this and their favourite phrases at the ready. "Trust me! You won't feel a thing" And "Oops, is this supposed to bleed so much?" Stats: +5% Base Healing quality, new: +10% Medical tending speed, +10% Medical operation speed, +15% Medical success chance Materials: Metallic
[h2]Riding crop[/h2] Description: While virtually useless as a weapon, Riding crops have proven to give extremely dominant image of the wielder, and thus speeding up the recruitment process Stats: +5% Prisoner recruitment chance, new: +15% Animal tame chance Materials: Leathery
[h2]Cane[/h2] Description: Cane with a heavy knob as a handle. Makes the user seem all the more respectable and very suave. Also helps them keep on their feet Stats: +25% Social impact Materials: Metallic, Woody
[h2]Mechano-Wrench[/h2] Description: Ginormous wrench, mainly used in spaceship maintenance but could technically be applied to mechanoid disassembly process. Stats: +100% Mechanoid disassembly efficiency, new +5% Building fix chance Materials: Metallic
[h2]Tailorer 3000[/h2] Description: Ginormous needle with attached scissors, It's not known what kind of twisted mind conjured up this tool but it's been found to be efficient at what it does. Stats: +30% Tailoring Speed Materials: Metallic
[h2]Meat Cleaver[/h2] Description: Tool designed to separate meat from bones and casting menacing shadows through shower curtains. Stats: +15% Butchery efficiency, +10% Butchery speed Materials: Metallic
[h2]Breadknife[/h2] Description: your favourite tool for cutting bread and ending quarrels. Stats: +5% butchery efficiency/speed +5 cooking speed new: -5% Food poison chance Materials: Metallic
[h2]Nailgun[/h2] Description: Your usual pneumatic nailgun. Stats: +15% construction speed Costs: 20 Steel and 1 Component
[h2]Chiphook[/h2] Description: What is a stone, eh? you cut it, you mold it, you chip it with a chiphook. Some say it's ruining a perfectly good stone; Others say it's art.. Stats: Mining Speed 2 %, Smoothing speed 10 %, Sculpting Speed 18 % Materials: Metallic, Stone
